content.rendered:
Our Services

SKILLVIRE's

We at SKILLVIRE provide the best guidance in psychological research to Indian students.  This service is tailored to students who struggle to conduct independent research and require ongoing assistance while learning. You can complete your project on time and to the required standards if you work with our professional and experienced team. Whether it is a research proposal or a synopsis, a term paper or an assignment, a dissertation or a thesis, a research paper or a conference presentation, we help students in research planning, assist them in data analysis (qualitative or quantitative), and guide them in the reporting.

  • We believe in empowering students, so we help, guide, and assist (just like a real guide). 
  • We help in domain selection, research type selection, variable selection, sample design, topic formulation, and methodology formulation.
  • We provide access to the limited-access research papers and psychological tools, and we also help with the data analysis.
  • We guide authors in framing the introduction, rationale, research gaps, results, discussions, references, etc. for a publication-fit manuscript.
  • We can help with paraphrasing, grammar correction, and plagiarism detection.

By getting in touch with us, you can get free basic advice on how to start or run a research project in psychology. To apply for any of our services, choose from the options below. Group discounts are available on qualitative analysis, quantitative analysis, review of literature guidance, research proposal guidance, full research guidance, and SPSS-statistics course only.

Free Basic Advice

See the price

Free Basic Advice

Price: Free

Contact now

Qualitative Analysis

See the price

Qualitative Analysis

Price:  ₹1500 (up to 3500 words)*

Contact now
Solutions we provide

We can assist you in doing/ building these things out of your qualitative data –
  • Qualitative content analysis (inductive or deductive) of transcripts, audio, video, images, documents, etc.
  • Qualitative network maps.
  • Groundedness of codes.
  • Code co-occurrence data.
  • And much more…
*Price is for the transcripts having upto 3500 words.  ₹1 extra for every 6 words post limit.

Key takeaways

You would get –
  • Analysis output.
  • Results.

Quantitative Analysis

See the price

Quantitative Analysis

Price: Starting from ₹300

Contact now
Solutions we provide

We can assist you in doing/ building/ calculating these things out of your quantitative data –
  • Data scoring. ( ₹500)
  • Data organizing and processing. ( ₹300)
  • Frequency distribution table. ( ₹300)
  • Graphs or charts. ( ₹500)
  • Descriptive statistics (mean, median, mode, average deviation, standard deviation, variance, quartile deviation, standard error of mean, skewness, kurtosis). ( ₹500)
  • Dealing with outliers. ( ₹500)
  • Normality testing. ( ₹500)
  • Assumptions testing. ( ₹800)
  • 2 independent or paired sample tests (parametric or non parametric). ( ₹500)
  • K independent or paired sample tests (parametric or non parametric). ( ₹500)
  • Correlation (parametric or non parametric). ( ₹500)
  • Regression (simple linear, multiple linear, multivariate linear). ( ₹800)
  • Internal consistency. ( ₹500)
  • Moderation. ( ₹1000)
  • Mediation. ( ₹1000)
  • And much more…
Post-analysis or editing charges ₹500.

Key takeaways

You would get –
  • Scored or treated data.
  • Analysis output.
  • Results.

Review of Literature

See the price

Review of Literature

Price:  ₹2000

Contact now
Solutions we provide

We can guide you in –
  • Topic selection.
  • Methodological framing.
  • Finding literature.
  • Tabulations.
  • Documentation.
  • Referencing.
  • And much more…

Key takeaways

You would get –
  • Credible databases for search (researches, thesis, and e-books)
  • Full access of almost all research papers and books.
  • Assistance in basic grammar and plagiarism checking.
  • Dedicated personal guidance at every stage.

Research Proposal

See the price

Research Proposal

Price:  ₹3000

Contact now
Solutions we provide

We can guide you in –
  • Topic selection.
  • Finding research gaps and rationale.
  • Methodological framing (qualitative or quantitative or mixed).
  • Finding literature.
  • Tabulations.
  • Finding tools.
  • Framing proposed outcomes.
  • Documentation.
  • Referencing.
  • And much more…

Key takeaways

You would get –
  • Credible databases for search (researches, thesis, and e-books)
  • Full access of almost all research papers and books.
  • Accessibility of psychological tools (free to use for research purpose only)
  • Assistance in basic grammar and plagiarism checking.
  • Dedicated personal guidance at every stage.

Full Research Guidance

See the price

Full Research Guidance

Price:  ₹4000

Contact now
Solutions we provide

We can guide/ assist you in –
  • Topic selection.
  • Finding research gaps and rationale.
  • Finding literature.
  • Methodological framing (qualitative or quantitative).
  • Building ethical statements.
  • Sample design.
  • Finding tools.
  • Scoring.
  • Data treatment and assumptions testing.
  • Data analysis (qualitative or quantitative).
  • Tabulations.
  • Documentation.
  • Referencing.
  • And much more…
1 free data analysis credit is available in this service. Post-analysis or editing as per the regular quantitative data analysis service.

Key takeaways

You would get –
  • Credible databases for search (researches, thesis, and e-books).
  • Full access of almost all research papers and books.
  • Accessibility of psychological tools (free to use for research purpose only).
  • Results of the data analysis.
  • Assistance in basic grammar and plagiarism checking.
  • Dedicated personal guidance at every stage.

Paraphrase & Grammar

See the price

Paraphrase and Grammar

Price:  ₹2000 (up to 15000 words)

Contact now
Solutions we provide

We can help you with –
Paraphrasing and grammar correction of up to 15000 words.

Key takeaways

You would get –
Completely paraphrased document with correct grammar and reduced plagiarism level.

Plagiarism Checking

See the price

Plagiarism Checking

Price:  ₹38 for up to 250 words

Contact now
Solutions we provide

We can help you with –
Identifying the amount plagiarism similarity in your content and provide you a report.
You can choose between multiple plagiarism checkers.

Key takeaways

You would get –
Plagiarism report with precise similarity indices.

SPSS-Statistics Course

See the price

SPSS-Statistics Course

Price:  ₹1000

Contact now
Solutions we provide

We can help you with –
Getting access of a basic course (Qualitative analysis in psychology using SPSS-Statistics) to equip you with the best research and statistics knowledge while making the most of MS Excel and SPSS Statistics.

Key takeaways

You would get –
  • Perpetual access to the lecture videos.
  • Access to all the E resources.
  • Access to Software.
  • E certificate after course completion.

For any more information, read our policies.
